Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a pale red-grey pottery vessel, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of three lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393957) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393957)
